title: Boutique London Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Discover a different side to London at the historic - with a twist - Town Hall Hotel and Apartments, located in the authentic East End hamlet of Bethnal Green. Just 12 minutes by tube to Oxford Circus, close to the popular V&A Museum of Childhood and filled with quirky coffee shops, trendy restaurants and cocktail bars, this is a location for those who like their city breaks a little different. Stay in boutique luxury and enjoy daily breakfast and a surprise welcome gift on arrival.
offer_address: 8 Patriot Square, London E2 9NF, United Kingdom
